00154 typedef enum IMB_BlendMode {

00156     IMB_BLEND_ADD = 1,

00186 typedef enum IMB_Timecode_Type {
00187     IMB_TC_NONE       = 0, /* don't use timecode files at all */
00188 
00189     IMB_TC_RECORD_RUN = 1, /* use images in the order as they are recorded
00190                             * (currently, this is the only one implemented
00191                             * and is a sane default) */
00192 
00193     IMB_TC_FREE_RUN   = 2, /* use global timestamp written by recording
00194                             * device (prosumer camcorders e.g. can do that) */
00195     IMB_TC_INTERPOLATED_REC_DATE_FREE_RUN = 4, /* interpolate a global timestamp using the
00196                                                 * record date and time written by recording
00197                                                 * device (*every* consumer camcorder can do
00198                                                 * that :) )*/
00199     IMB_TC_RECORD_RUN_NO_GAPS = 8,
00200     IMB_TC_MAX_SLOT   = 4
00201 } IMB_Timecode_Type;
00202 
00203 typedef enum IMB_Proxy_Size {
00204     IMB_PROXY_NONE = 0,
00205     IMB_PROXY_25 = 1,
00206     IMB_PROXY_50 = 2,
00207     IMB_PROXY_75 = 4,
00208     IMB_PROXY_100 = 8,
00209     IMB_PROXY_MAX_SLOT = 4
00210 } IMB_Proxy_Size;
